title: File:Fort jesus Mombasa Kenya.jpg
author: Derekkirima
description: It shows 16th century military masterpiece, declared a game park in 1958, and in 2011 declared as a World heritage site by UNESCO. It is Mombasa Kenya most visited tourist attraction with very rich 5 centuries East Africa coastal history. If you travel to Kenya, Fort Jesus is a must visit site. While you are there you will learn why the Portuguese chose that strategic site to control the East African sea trade and how the Arabs fought them over the centuries to control the East Africa coastal trade. You will also see the heavy artilleries and weaponry used at the time to sink enemy vessels for maximum protection.
